264750.name: Assassin’s Creed® IV Black Flag™ - Time saver: Technology Pack
264750.description:
Obtain a technology advantage that removes the requirement to find the 18 Upgrade Plans to be able to buy the higher ship upgrades (gameplay and cosmetic upgrades).

Important: You need to progress until Sequence 3 memory 04 to see the effect of this DLC. The plan requirement will be removed from the best ship’s upgrades. You still need to get money and resources to be able to buy and equip them.
264750.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 意大利语*, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 捷克语, 丹麦语, 荷兰语, 芬兰语, 挪威语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西*, 俄语*, 瑞典语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
